arts.ttl: Sky: Probable Milan XI for Atalanta clash – largely unchanged with trust in mind
arts.sum: By: Ben Dixon AC Milan will name a largely unchanged side against Atalanta on Tuesday night; however, it could be a big chance for some. The result against Pisa was not good enough, but considering the circumstances, it is not the end of the world. Saying that, though, some may be close to their final chance if they […] The post Sky: Probable Milan XI for Atalanta clash – largely unchanged with trust in mind appeared first on SempreMilan.

arts.ttl: Serie A preview: Atalanta vs. AC Milan – Team news, opposition insight, stats and prediction
arts.sum: By: Oliver Fisher AC Milan have a rare midweek game to contend with as they make the short trip to Bergamo to face Atalanta on Tuesday night. For Milan, the events of Friday night must still sting as they squandered the opportunity to lock in top spot for another week, drawing 2-2 against a Pisa side who were […] The post Serie A preview: Atalanta vs. AC Milan – Team news, opposition insight, stats and prediction appeared first on SempreMilan.

arts.ttl: Gimenez or Nkunku: who should start for Milan vs Atalanta?
arts.sum: Ten days ago, Milan beat Fiorentina in the final minutes, coming from behind, thanks in part to Santiago Gimenez’s entrance. His hard work and positioning allowed Rafael Leao to escape the constant attention of opposing central defenders. Against Pisa, the Mexican started from the first minute. Leao benefited again, but the former Feyenoord striker was […]

arts.ttl: Juric speaks about Atalanta issues, ‘great’ Milan team and game plan: “Built to win”
arts.sum: By: Ben Dixon The calendar has not been too kind to AC Milan recently, and they will play their third game in nine days against Atalanta tomorrow. There is a lot that can be said about the season so far, and despite another frustrating result at San Siro – this time against Pisa – a lot of good […] The post Juric speaks about Atalanta issues, ‘great’ Milan team and game plan: “Built to win” appeared first on SempreMilan.

arts.ttl: AI Supercomputer Serie A Predictions For Matchday 9: Joy For Juventus, Atalanta And AC Milan Share Spoils, Napoli And Roma Victorious
arts.sum: The Serie A predictions for matchday 9 are in and Juventus can expect a victory for the first time since September 13. FootItalia’s AI supercomputer envisages a win for the Bianconeri at home to Udinese on October 29. The team will be led by Massimo Brambilla after Igor Tudor’s dismissal. arts.ttl: GdS: Stopping Leao and finding goals – Juric draws up Atalanta’s plan to face Milan
arts.sum: By: Oliver Fisher Atalanta head coach Ivan Juric is planning how best to contain AC Milan, and in particular the in-form Rafael Leao. As La Gazzetta dello Sport (seen below) write, Atalanta have flipped the script in terms of their playing style. They have the third-best defence in the league, but their six draws in eight games shows […] The post GdS: Stopping Leao and finding goals – Juric draws up Atalanta’s plan to face Milan appeared first on SempreMilan.

arts.ttl: Atalanta coach Juric assigns Kossounou to contain Milan’s Leao
arts.sum: According to this morning’s edition of Gazzetta dello Sport, tomorrow night against Milan, Atalanta coach Ivan Juric is expected to start Odilon Kossounou in defence. His main task will be to contain Rafael Leao, who scored three goals in Milan’s last two league matches against Fiorentina and Pisa. After the draw against Cremonese, Juric spoke […]

arts.ttl: Allegri welcomes back Ruben Loftus-Cheek ahead of Atalanta fixture
arts.sum: Ahead of tomorrow night’s away match against Atalanta, Massimiliano Allegri regains Ruben Loftus-Cheek but will still be without Pervis Estupiñán. This emerged from yesterday’s training session at Milanello. The English midfielder, who suffered muscle fatigue during the final session before the Fiorentina match, has returned to group training. As for the left-sided wing-back, still dealing […]
